entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: Maksim-Manojlovic/NodeJS-ExpressJS-Web-tools: Web Tools is a collection of lightweight and efficient tools designed for web-related tasks such as image manipulation, PDF management, SEO analysis, and more. The repository includes utilities like H-Extractors, LinkCounter, Page-Speed-Analyze, TechSpy, and others. Each tool serves a unique purpose to optimize workflows for developers
entry.content: Web Tools is a collection of lightweight and efficient tools designed for web-related tasks such as image manipulation, PDF management, SEO analysis, and more.
